title: Apple Support College Program At Home Advisor - California State University Bakersfield
summary: At Apple, we believe that dedication, a fun environment, creativity and innovation fuel the ultimate customer experience. Our Advisors engage with customers, help troubleshoot issues, and provide an incredible customer experience.
description: At Apple, we believe our diverse backgrounds, perspectives, and passions help us create the ideas that move us forward. As an Apple Support College Advisor, you'll support popular products, provide world-class customer service, troubleshoot, and receive competitive pay with benefits.
key_qualifications: Enrolled through December of 2026 or later in at least one class at a U.S. university, have a quiet home workspace with an internet connection, ability to flex hours, meet typing speed requirements, and more.
preferred_qualifications: Business, Communications, Computer Science, Engineering or any other tech related major, passion for customer service, flexibility, resilience, effective time management, inclusivity, and more.
pay_benefits: Base pay for this role is between $22.00 and $26.40/hr. Apple also offers a total compensation package including benefits such as medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, discounted products, and tuition reimbursement. Eligibility requirements apply.
